span.strong: Check back here in late May for 2020-21 School Year Information.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Enter the Community "South Brunswick Community Education Summer Programs, Tennis & Adult School" & continue.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Read the 3 options on the next screen to determine if you are an existing user or a New User.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: If you are unsure, please email

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: .Once you log in, hit the "Register/Browse Activities" button, then select the season "Winter/Spring 2020 Adult Community School" and hit continue.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: You are now ready to verify your account, then select Adult Classes.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Roboto; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: You will automatically receive an email confirmation of your transaction.
